title: Whats worse than failing to log in 12 times?
body: Having to wait for a 20sec timer to go down to 1 just to tell me it fails each damn time.

replies.body: Something like this actually happend to me too a few months back. I had to continously log in, then log back out, and repeat that process so many times that eventually I would just give up. I decided to re-download League (I know it's a pain in the ass but it worked for me, I don't know about you) and it did the trick. Also, make sure your internet is set. Best of luck!

Hey Fredart, have you taken a look at SquidmoX's post regarding [login issues on NA](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/KxOhw3OU-login-issues-on-na)? As the post suggests, if you're still having issues after trying out some potential solutions, please feel free to hit up Player Support via ticket, and we can assist you further.
